column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////If you go for the large
column2: it takes about 30 to 40 minutes but if you go for the personal
column3: it cuts the cooking time to more than half. I'd skip on an appetizer and wait for the dish because this is more than filling. I tried the plain cheese and the flakey buttery crust was just perfect
column4: plus the cheese portion is modest allowing one to taste all the other fresh ingredients. If you really like it
column5: you can pick up some from the freezer to take home. I was happy with it but would not substitute for a traditional pizza.
